com.rigado.rigablue

Interface IRigCoreBluetoothDiscoveryObserver

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IRigCoreBluetoothCommon
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RigLeDiscoveryManager

    public interface IRigCoreBluetoothDiscoveryObserver
extends IRigCoreBluetoothCommon
    This interface provides methods for device discovery operations performed by the low level Bluetooth stack. It should not be implemented by applications using Rigablue.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void didDiscoverDevice(android.bluetooth.BluetoothDevice btDevice, int rssi, byte[] scanRecord)
      This method is called when a device matching the appropriate discovery parameters is found.
      void discoveryFinishedByTimeout()
      This method is called when a discovery session finishes after the specified timeout.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.rigado.rigablue.IRigCoreBluetoothCommon

        bluetoothDoesNotSupported, bluetoothPowerStateChanged

    • Method Detail

      • didDiscoverDevice

        void didDiscoverDevice(android.bluetooth.BluetoothDevice btDevice,
                       int rssi,
                       byte[] scanRecord)
        This method is called when a device matching the appropriate discovery parameters is found.
        Parameters:
        btDevice - The discovered device
        rssi - The RSSI of the discovered device
        scanRecord - The scan response data, will be NULL if no scan response is avaialble

      • discoveryFinishedByTimeout

        void discoveryFinishedByTimeout()
        This method is called when a discovery session finishes after the specified timeout.
